title: Duration Calculator
subtitle: A simple tool to calculate your durations irrespective of time.
label: Select a language:
rowTooltip: Note: the maximum number of rows for this table is {{maxRowCount}}.

tooltips.compute: Click this button to compute the total duration.
tooltips.adjust: Drag the slider handle to adjust the number of rows in the table, from {{minRowSize}} to {{maxRowSize}}.
tooltips.operandDropDown: Select the mathematical operation you want to perform. Note: this is applied on the running total.
tooltips.scaleField: Set the value you wish to multiply or divide the running total by.
